channel.title: Before You Build on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Before You Build on Orange Academy

item.title: The Twelve-Factor App
item.description: The Twelve-Factor App the set of best practices and standards for producing cloud native apps. By implementing the 12 Factor App, we can have scalable, maintainable, and portable services.

item.title: Requesting a Sub-Experience
item.description: At The Home Depot, a group of related products falls under what we call an Experience

item.title: Getting Started With an Architecture Security Assessment
item.description: Part of getting an application to production, or prior to significant changes in an application, is to have it reviewed and approved by security.
